statements: SELECT software_name, license_key, expiration_date FROM software_licenses;
SELECT * FROM software_licenses ORDER BY software_name ASC;
SELECT software_name, expiration_date FROM software_licenses WHERE is_compliant = TRUE;
SELECT id, software_name, license_key FROM software_licenses WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT software_name, license_key, expiration_date, is_compliant FROM software_licenses ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT id, software_name, expiration_date FROM software_licenses WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_licenses WHERE is_compliant = true AND software_name LIKE 'Microsoft%' ORDER BY software_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_licenses, MAX(expiration_date) AS latest_expiration FROM software_licenses WHERE is_compliant = true;
SELECT software_name, COUNT(*) AS total_licenses FROM software_licenses GROUP BY software_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_licenses DESC;

SELECT id, software_name, license_key, expiration_date, is_compliant FROM software_licenses WHERE expiration_date <= '2023-06-30' AND is_compliant = false ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, software_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM licenses;
SELECT software_name, expiration_date FROM licenses;
SELECT license_key, software_name, expiration_date FROM licenses WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT license_id, software_name FROM licenses ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, is_compliant FROM compliance_data WHERE is_compliant = true;
SELECT * FROM licenses WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT software_name, license_key FROM licenses WHERE software_name LIKE 'Microsoft%' ORDER BY license_key DESC
SELECT company_name, is_compliant FROM compliance_data WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND is_compliant = TRUE
SELECT software_name, expiration_date FROM licenses WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT license_id, software_name, expiration_date FROM licenses JOIN compliance_data ON licenses.license_id = compliance_data.license_id WHERE is_compliant = FALSE
SELECT * FROM software_licenses;
SELECT software_name, expiration_date FROM software_licenses;
SELECT license_type, software_name FROM software_licenses WHERE license_type = 'Trial';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, organization FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_licenses WHERE license_type = 'Standard' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;

SELECT software_name, expiration_date, compliance_status FROM software_licenses JOIN compliance_data ON software_licenses.license_id = compliance_data.license_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY software_name ASC, expiration_date ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, software_licenses.software_name, compliance_data.compliance_status FROM customers JOIN software_licenses ON customers.customer_id = software_licenses.license_id JOIN compliance_data ON software_licenses.license_id = compliance_data.license_id WHERE customers.organization = 'XYZ Inc';
SELECT software_name, license_type FROM software_licenses WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01' AND license_type IN ('Standard', 'Premium') ORDER BY software_name ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, software_licenses.software_name, compliance_status FROM customers JOIN software_licenses ON customers.customer_id = software_licenses.license_id JOIN compliance_data ON software_licenses.license_id = compliance_data.license_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY customers.customer_name DESC, software_licenses.software_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM software_licenses;
SELECT software_name, license_type FROM software_licenses;
SELECT license_id, software_name, issue_date FROM software_licenses ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT license_id, software_name, license_key FROM software_licenses WHERE license_type = 'Subscription';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, company_name, email FROM customers WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT compliance_id, compliance_status, expiry_date FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Active' ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT billing_id, billing_address, card_number FROM billing_info WHERE card_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM software_licenses WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM software_licenses ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT software_name, license_type FROM software_licenses WHERE license_type='Full';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM license_users WHERE user_role='Admin' LIMIT 5;
SELECT compliance_status, last_checked_date FROM compliance_data WHERE last_checked_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT log_description FROM user_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM software_licenses WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT software_name, license_type FROM software_licenses ORDER BY license_type ASC, software_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM license_users WHERE user_role='Admin' OR user_role='Manager';
SELECT software_name, compliance_status, last_checked_date FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status='Non-Compliant' ORDER BY last_checked_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, log_description, log_date FROM user_logs JOIN license_users ON user_logs.user_id = license_users.user_id WHERE license_users.license_id = 1;
